creator: hatkinson95
title: How to draw Simba
description: This project provides a step-by-step guide on how to draw Simba from 'The Lion King'. It begins with basic guidelines and gradually adds shape and detail to create the final drawing.
steps: Draw a faint circle as a guideline for Simba's head.
Add vertical and horizontal curved guidelines within the circle for facial features.
Draw ears on either side of the horizontal line, with the left ear slightly larger.
Outline the eyes on the horizontal line, with the right eye touching the vertical line.
Draw an upside-down triangle for the nose, halfway between the horizontal line and the bottom of the circle.
Draw two curves for the mouth that meet on the vertical guideline, and a curve below the circle for the chin.
Round off the nose shape and add curves for the nostrils. Connect the nose to the base of the right eye with a line, and add a shorter line on the left. Add two small curved lines above the nose.
Add a curved line joining the mouth to the nose, shaping Simba's muzzle.
Add a jagged line to the bottom of the chin to create the effect of fur.
Draw rough lines on either side of the nose for whiskers.

Tighten the shape of Simba's face by drawing a curved line from the guideline circle towards the outside of the eye to create a cheek on the right side. Follow the shape of the eye up and join it to the top of the circle.
Add shape to the left side by bringing in the shape of the circle to a more angled line.
Add fur to the top of his head using a jagged line.
Detail the left ear by drawing a curved line halfway down and finishing near the top of the outer ear. Draw a curve down from this line for the inner ear.
Add three short lines inside the curve to detail the inner ear.
Draw similar curves to the right ear, following the smaller shaping.
Again, draw three short lines inside the curve to add the inside of the ear's details.
Fill in the inner of the eye, leaving a small white circle, and add thickness to the shaping around the eyes.
Define the shaping and features with a black pen and erase any visible pencil marks.
